metadata.name: Piso 23 - Noise Coin
metadata.description:
The first holder will be added to "Piso 23" split-sheet to be able to collect 25% of streaming royalties in perpetuity (the royalties are not transferable).

Holder additions:  
· Care package with unique physical items  
· Lead future proposals and assist in the growth of this project  
· VIP access to any of my future shows that I perform  
· Credits on my next music release  
· Downloadable audio .wav file (non-commercial use)  
· Access to my whitelist for future projects

Song info:  
Written, recorded, performed and produced by Paulo Alejandro Ramirez Chavez (Alex Paul) 
Recorded at Noise Agency Studios

Roadmap: http://alexpaul.xyz/
